words.source: H6213 wayyiqtol 3mp Qal of עָשָׂה 'to do, make'; KJV 'did', ESV 'did', NASB 'did'
H3651 adv. ken 'so, thus'; KJV 'so', ESV 'the same', NASB 'the same'
H2748 art. + n.mp chartom 'magician, diviner'; KJV 'the magicians', ESV 'the magicians', NASB 'the magicians'
H3909 prep. b- + n.mp lat 'secret art, enchantment' + 3mp suff.; KJV 'with their enchantments', ESV 'by their secret arts', NASB 'with their secret arts'
H5927 wayyiqtol 3mp Hiphil of עָלָה 'to go up'; KJV 'brought up', ESV 'brought up', NASB 'brought up'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H6854 art. + n.fp tsephardeyaʿ 'frog'; KJV 'frogs', ESV 'frogs', NASB 'frogs'
H5921 prep. ʿal 'over, upon'; KJV 'upon', ESV 'over', NASB 'over'
H776 n.fs construct ʾerets 'land, earth'; KJV 'the land', ESV 'the land', NASB 'the land'
H4714 proper name Mitsrayim 'Egypt'; all trans. agree
